name: EMS Event Message Response Code
description: A CodeSystem to identify the response associated with the event message.

concept.definition: The NHS number provided in the message is not valid (based on being 10 digits long and the 10th digit being a check digit)

concept.display: NHS Number Does Not Exist on PDS
concept.definition: The NHS number provided in the message does not match on PDS

concept.display: NHS Number Does Not Match Name And/Or/Gender And/Or DOB
concept.definition: The NHS number provided in the message does not match the name and/or gender and/or DOB on PDS

concept.display: Service Not Entitled to Publish Event Type XXX
concept.definition: The event type published is not allowed to be published by service YYY

concept.display: Supplier not accredited to publish messages
concept.definition: The supplier system publishing the message has not been through the accreditation process

concept.display: Provider not accredited to publish messages
concept.definition: The provider publishing the message has not been through the accreditation process
The SNOMED code supplied in the FHIR message does
Message is not in XML or JSON format
The received event is not a recognised event
The received event does not conform to the associated event type scheme
